name: Into The Crops
description:
Into the Crops is a horror game inspired by the early 2000s horror games for the PS1 such as Silent Hill and the PS1 Haunted Demodisks. Created by 5 students of the University of Alicante as part of their Project Based Learning with only C++ and OpenGL.

Full release date 01/06/2022

Follow us on Twitter

Currently we implemented the beta of the First level. Feedback is appreciaed and we will upload more content as we keep working.
Currently known bugs:
- Moving diagonally makes the character go faster than intended

- Whenever colliding diagonally with a wall the collission wont work.

Story

It's 1968 and you find yourself travelling through the countryside between Newburyport and Arkham, Massachusets, when you lose control of your car and you drive through the vasts cornfields that smother everything in sight.

Your car is beyond repair and you are completely lost in an endless cornfield. No matter how much you run through the fields, you never seem to find an exit. The only thing you can see is a church in the distance, and so your adventure begins.
